messages.title: Keep our children safe campaign
messages.content: Ann Coffey MP supports community campaign at Woodbank Community Centre for a new pedestrian crossing. Concern over traffic making the road unsafe, especially for children accessing the park with a playground, which increases the potential for a serious accident.

messages.title: Stockport's stunning poppy appeal
messages.content: Raised a staggering £60,000 for The Royal British Legion's poppy appeal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting employment by inviting employers to participate in jobs fairs, endorsing apprenticeships, and encouraging lifelong skills development.
Focused on increasing police presence on streets and tackling anti-social behavior.
Campaigning for a planning clampdown on too many fast-food takeaways.
Advocating for those who provide voluntary, social services and more to local elderly, helping to relieve the stress from caregivers.
Supporting Stockport County and the construction of a Sports Complex to create a community asset and promote sports among youths.

housing.content: Supports campaign for a new pedestrian crossing to keep children safe. Concern over traffic around the Woodbank Community Centre and the accessibility to the park with a playground for children.

contactInformation.phone: Call 483 2600 for details of Ann's surgeries
